department.ch: 土木工程學系營建管理碩士班
department.en: Master‘s Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering

goal.ch: 讓學生熟悉基礎之營建規劃知識與技巧、排程及成本控制之技術。
goal.en: “Familiarize students with basic construction planning knowledge and skills. Scheduling and cost control techniques, especially use of famous computer software packages, will be emphasized in this course.“

outline.ch:
“1. 要徑法計算
1.1 排程工具複習
1.2 要徑法浮時計算
1.3 邏輯網圖的計算(提前與延遲)
2. 排程技術
2.1 柵欄網狀圖
2.2 排程過程與限制
2.3 ADI(Activity Definition Index)
2.4 VPM(Vertical Production Method)
2.5 ABSS(Automatic Schedule Generations)
3. 時程控制
3.1 時程控制
3.2 時間/成本互換
4.成本控制
4.1 現金流量分析
4.2 成本控制與實獲值分析
5.資源管理“
outline.en:
1. CPM Calculation
1.1 Review of Scheduling Tools.
1.2 CPM Calculations and Floats.
1.3 PDM Leads and Lags.
2. Scheduling Techniques
2.1 Fenced Bar Chart.
2.2 Scheduling Process and Constraints.
2.3 Activity Definition Index (BSI and CSI).
2.4 Vertical Production Method (VPM).
2.5 Automatic Schedule Generations (ABSS).
3. Schedule Control
3.1 Schedule Control.
3.2 Time/Cost Trade-off.
4. Cost Control
4.1 Cash Flow Analysis (CFFS).
4.2 Cost Control and Earned Value Analysis.
5. Resources Management
-Resources Allocation

gradMethod.ch:
“作業50％
期中考20％
期末考20％
期末報告10％“
gradMethod.en:
“Homework...…………………………………...……… 50％
Midterm Exam…………………………………………20％
Final Exam……………..………………………………20％
Term Project ………………………………………….. 10％
※ Homework Requirements:
1. Only computer printouts are accepted.
2. Due dates will be the next week after each assignment.
3. Unless specified, each PMS homework means it should be turned in with three PMS software outputs, I.e., MS, P3, and OPP.\“

domain.ch:
營建管理


、


資訊與電腦軟體應用


、


工程實務與應用
domain.en:
營建管理


、


資訊與電腦軟體應用


、


工程實務與應用

ch.competencies: 具備營建管理專業能力
具備獨立研究及創新思考能力
具備專案執行及團隊合作領導能力
具備永續與國際觀及社會服務能力
具備國際論文發表之能力

en.competencies: Capability of independent research and innovative thinking
Capability of executing a project and leading the team work
Capability of serving the society with a vision of globalization and sustainability
Capability of presenting and publishing papers in international conferences

ch: 系所:限土木工程學系營建管理碩士班。年級:限一年級。
系所:限土木工程學系營建管理博士班。
en: Department:Master‘s Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering only.Year:First Year only.
Department:Ph.D. Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering only.
